slide.title: Connection String
slide.example:
<?php
$options = array( 'replicaSet' => 'seta' );

$m = new Mongo( 'mongodb://user:password@localhost:13000/demo', $options );

$m = new Mongo( 'mongodb://localhost:13000,localhost:13001', $options );

$m = new Mongo( 'mongodb://localhost:13000,localhost:13001', $options );
?>
